attributes.action: Petition in support of tougher sentences and greater protection for retailers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the murder of retailer, who was bludgeoned to death by a teenage gang in West Yorkshire, we are calling on the Government to enact:-

1. Tougher sentences to perpetrators of violent crime

2. Provide greater support and protection for retailers

This petition is organised on behalf of independent retailers and is fully supported by all communities.
